name: Lavafloor
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lava floor
des:
Play "The floor is lava" with Alexa. It is played by people of all ages, in which the players imagine that the floor or ground is made of lava. Have fun. Hurry up, find a save place!

"The floor is lava", the game for young and old.

Now Alexa challenges you. Can you save yourself from the lava? One two three four five! Did you win against the lava!

Fun for the whole family.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
